comment: No Wikipedia website found for this party

It is hard to determine the political orientation of this parliamentary group since PSC is CL and UNITS is CCR. These two parties joined into a parliamentary group for 2017 and 2019 election mainly because they were both “centrist” and opposed Catalan independence. Therefore, we treat the parliamentary group as centre (C).
